name: A Fable of the Grasshopper and the Owl
name_original: A Fable of the Grasshopper and the Owl
description:
My second completed project! The required specification was to create a narrative story-based game which fits the theme: a fable of the grasshopper and the owl.

This project is relatively small and was built to illustrate agency and player choice.

A zip of the final build is provided
